title: Rainy night city driving with moderate speed and frequent braking.
caption: A white van drives down a rainy city street at moderate speed, with a red bus and a parked truck on the side.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 5.1 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. The driver is cautious and attentive to the traffic situation, adjusting the speed and distance to other vehicles accordingly.
